author: LC Creations

game.author: MeseCraft
game.name: mesecraft
game.short_description: Work in Progress. The best game for Minetest. A survival game with new depth, mechanics, biomes, mobs and many essential additions. Has a focus on being fun, user-friendly, stable, and minimalist but featured.
game.title: MeseCraft

game.name: nonsensical_skyblock
game.short_description: skyblock game BASED on crafting. no quest cringe! bonemeal go brrrr
game.title: Nonsensical Skyblock

game.author: Minetest
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

game.author: mt-mods
game.name: dreambuilder_game
game.short_description: Dreambuilder is my attempt to give the player pretty much everything they could ever want to build with, and all the tools they should need to actually get the job done.
game.title: Dreambuilder Game

game.author: BuckarooBanzay

long_description:
NOTICE: This mod is a modification of the [mesecons_luacontroller] mod in the [mesecons] modpack.
The original source code can be found below:
https://github.com/minetest-mods/mesecons/blob/master/mesecons_luacontroller/init.lua

Lua Controller Block v1.0


DESCRIPTION
==============================
Adds a node to Minetest that functions like a Lua Controller with added functionality.


LICENSE
==============================
Copyright (C) 2011-2016 Mesecons Mod Developer Team and contributors

Copyright (C) 2023 LandonAConway


INSTALLATION
==============================
Place this folder inside Minetest Directory>mods


SUPPORT
==============================
Report bugs here on GitHub
name: mesecons_luacontroller_block
short_description: Adds a block that functions like a Lua Controller but has 'e' (down) and 'f' (up) pins and ports
title: Lua Controller Block
